item.title: QuantChallenge 2025
item.description: Simple Statistical Modeling Rolling window for average and volatility Monte Carlo use $\mu$ and $\sigma$ to simulate thousand of possible game outcomes probaility of winning into a fair value price adjust our fair value price with the tru emarket price. we assume we have some edge to the market. Real fair = 0.7 our fair + 0.3 market fair Market Making Provide liquidity to the market assuming the fair value and that people will want to trade at that fair value.
